min_abils	commalist(min_str,min_dex,min_con,min_int,min_wis,min_cha)
any_race	multiple(kit_race_human,kit_race_dwarf,kit_race_elf,kit_race_gnome,kit_race_halfling,kit_race_half_elf,kit_race_halforc,spec_race_human,spec_race_dwarf,spec_race_elf,spec_race_gnome,spec_race_halfling,spec_race_half_elf,spec_race_halforc)
human		multiple(kit_race_human,spec_race_human)
dwarf		multiple(kit_race_dwarf,spec_race_dwarf)
elf		multiple(kit_race_elf,spec_race_elf)
halfling	multiple(kit_race_halfling,spec_race_halfling)
gnome		multiple(kit_race_gnome,spec_race_gnome)
half_elf	multiple(kit_race_half_elf,spec_race_half_elf)
halforc		multiple(kit_race_halforc,spec_race_halforc)
description	multiple_fill(kitlist_help,clastext_descstr)
desc		multiple_fill(kitlist_help,clastext_descstr)
lower		multiple_fill(kitlist_lower,clastext_lower)
mixed		multiple_fill(kitlist_mixed,clastext_mixed)
alignment	commalist(l_g,n_g,c_g,l_n,n_n,c_n,l_e,n_e,c_e)
colors		commalist(color_metal,color_minor_cloth,color_main_cloth,color_leather,color_armor)
name		mixedcase(mixed,lower)
biography	multiple_fill(clastext_biography)
bio		multiple_fill(clastext_biography)
melee		multiple(prof_bastardsword,prof_longsword,prof_shortsword,prof_axe,prof_twohandedsword,prof_katana,prof_scimitarwakisashininjato,prof_dagger,prof_warhammer,prof_club,prof_spear,prof_halberd,prof_flailmorningstar,prof_mace,prof_quarterstaff)
ranged		multiple(prof_crossbow,prof_longbow,prof_shortbow,prof_dart,prof_sling)
styles		multiple(prof_2handed,prof_swordandshield,prof_singleweapon,prof_2weapon)
bastardsword	multiple(prof_bastardsword)
longsword	multiple(prof_longsword)
shortsword	multiple(prof_shortsword)
axe		multiple(prof_axe)
twohandedsword	multiple(prof_twohandedsword)
katana		multiple(prof_katana)
scimitarwakisashininjato	multiple(prof_scimitarwakisashininjato)
dagger		multiple(prof_dagger)
warhammer	multiple(prof_warhammer)
club		multiple(prof_club)
spear		multiple(prof_spear)
halberd		multiple(prof_halberd)
flailmorningstar	multiple(prof_flailmorningstar)
mace		multiple(prof_mace)
quarterstaff	multiple(prof_quarterstaff)
crossbow	multiple(prof_crossbow)
longbow		multiple(prof_longbow)
shortbow	multiple(prof_shortbow)
dart		multiple(prof_dart)
sling		multiple(prof_sling)
2handed		multiple(prof_2handed)
swordandshield	multiple(prof_swordandshield)
singleweapon	multiple(prof_singleweapon)
2weapon		multiple(prof_2weapon)
